attributes.action: Change the law to make it illegal for the BBC to use the BBC licence tax income to pay Industrial Tribunal Compensation Awards.
attributes.additional_details: There are going to be hundreds of industrial tribunal cases arising out of the illegal, criminal shenanigans of senior and highest level managers at the BBC.  It cannot be right that taxpayers can be made to bear the cost of the many HUGE compensation orders which can be expected.  Taxpayers DID NOT COMMIT THE CRIMES; it is KNOWN INDIVIDUALS (those same individuals who have control of the BBC Licence Tax Payments) within the BBC who committed the crimes and IT IS THEY WHO SHOULD PAY!

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC Trust.
